title: Sindhu Nadhiyin Isai Lyrics Kai Koduttha Dheivam
stanzas:
<div>
Sindhu Nadhiyin Isai Lyrics Kai Koduttha Dheivam

Sindhu nadhiyin isai nilavinilae
sera nannaatilam pengaludane.
sundra thelunginil paatisaithu
tholigal oati vilaiyaadi varuvom (2)

gangai nadhi purathu
godhumai pandam (2)
kaaviri vetrilaikku
maaru kolvom.

singa maraatiyar tham
kavithai kondu.
serathu thanthangal
parisalippom. (2)

Sindhu nadhiyin isai nilavinilae
sera nannaatilam pengaludane.
sundra thelunginil paatisaithu
tholigal oati vilaiyaadi varuvom

singala theevinik or
paalam amaippom.
saethuvai maeduruthi
veedhi samaippom (2)

vangathil oadi varum
neerin migaiyaal.
maiyaththu nadigalil
payir seiyyuvom.

Sindhu nadhiyin isai nilavinilae
sera nannaatilam pengaludane.
sundra thelunginil paatisaithu
tholigal oati vilaiyaadi varuvom
category: OldSong:Sindhu Nadhiyin Isai - Kai Koduttha Dheivam
